main.label: In MatchMe you can
main.text: A simple and fast dating app where everyone can find their soulmate.

description: This is your application in English

footer.copyright: © 2024 MatchMe Dating Service. All rights reserved.

aboutBot: is an innovative dating application integrated with Telegram. We help you find people looking for casual dating, friendship, or serious relationships. Join our community and start chatting with interesting people!

tabs.title: Photos from Telegram at a Touch
points: All profile photos can be uploaded to MatchMe with just a touch.

tabs.title: Chats in the App
points: Chat with users with whom you've matched directly in the app.
Receive new messages in the bot.

tabs.title: Profile Swipes
points: Easily swipe through profiles — swipe right to like, swipe left to skip.
While swiping through profiles, you can immediately see photos, age, and brief information about the person.

tabs.title: View Likes
points: See all users who liked your profile and decide whether to like them back.
View mutual likes in chats. You can write immediately there.
In the bottom menu, new likes will be displayed as notifications.

errorVideo: Your browser does not support video.

advantages.title: Integration with Telegram
advantages.descr: Quick access directly from the messenger and upload photos from your profile

advantages.title: Minimalism
advantages.descr: No unnecessary features or complexities. All focus on communication and finding suitable people

advantages.title: Free Access
advantages.descr: All basic features are available for free, without subscriptions or hidden fees

advantages.title: Quick Registration
advantages.descr: With Telegram authorization, no password or email is required
